wikipedia_page.main: Albert Hare (12 May 1887 – 23 December 1969) was a British track and field athlete who competed in the 1912 Summer Olympics in Stockholm, Sweden.In 1912 he was eliminated in the first round of the 1500 metres competition. He was born in New Cross, London and died in Bexhill-on-Sea.
